mods.abstract: Document commissioning William Lauderdale as Captain in the 15th regiment of the Tennessee militia. Signed by Willie Blount. Includes seal of the State of Tennessee. To all who shall see these presents, Greeting: Know ye, that reposing special trust and confidence in the patriotism, valor, conduct, and fidelity of William Lauderdale of the county of Sumner, we do commission him Captain in the 15th regiment of militia of this state â€¦"
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. Users are solely responsible for determining the existence of such instances and for obtaining any other permissions and paying associated fees that may be necessary for the intended use.
